programme.title: Dead Uncle
programme.desc: Cristian, who has no job and no desire to find one, has only one way out: to retrieve the urine of a jaguar in the remote Apulian countryside to carry out a very dangerous mission.

programme.title: Bed of a thousand pleasure
programme.desc: A whimsical reimagining of the famous 1001 Nights, filled with intrigue, romance, and fantasy.

programme.title: Kidnap Syndicate
programme.desc: Based on an actual event "The Kidnap Syndicate" is the story of two boys, one from a rich family and the other from a poor family, who are kidnapped and held for ransom.

programme.title: Passion's Flower
programme.desc: Jeff is a charming middle-aged man who, after being released from prison, meets the seductive Linda, with whom he has a brief affair. Soon, however, Jeff discovers that Linda is actually his brother's wife and this only complicates matters further. The two, in fact, continue to see each other clandestinely, but love, in time, will turn into something macabre, at times lethal.

programme.title: Thieves and Robbers
programme.desc: A playboy who makes a living out of seducing women and stealing their jewellery accidentally witnesses a Mafia murder. He must work together with the man who is constantly trying to catch him, Lt. Alan Parker, in order to save his life.

programme.title: Days of Violence
programme.desc: Jos becomes an outlaw following the killing of his brother by a Yankee officer. Taken hostage Christine, the murderer's fiancée, tries to reach the frontier.

programme.title: Cinque per l'inferno
programme.desc: Cinque per l'inferno features five men caught in a dangerous mission against sinister forces.

programme.title: Appassionata
programme.desc: A passionate and forbidden love story that unfolds between two characters from different walks of life.

programme.title: The Alcove
programme.desc: 1936. Commander Elio returns from the Abyssinian front. Back home in Italy, his wife and his secretary, also her lover, are waiting for him. The man has a beautiful black girl with him, which triggers perversions and jealousies.
